members.name: desktop
members.comment: The instance of JDesktopPane.

members.name: desktopManager
members.comment: The instance of DesktopManager.

members.name: minimizeKey
members.comment: As of Java 2 platform v1.3 this previously undocumented field is no longer used. Key bindings are now defined by the LookAndFeel, please refer to the key bindings specification for further details.

members.name: maximizeKey
members.comment: As of Java 2 platform v1.3 this previously undocumented field is no longer used. Key bindings are now defined by the LookAndFeel, please refer to the key bindings specification for further details.

members.name: closeKey
members.comment: As of Java 2 platform v1.3 this previously undocumented field is no longer used. Key bindings are now defined by the LookAndFeel, please refer to the key bindings specification for further details.

members.name: navigateKey
members.comment: As of Java 2 platform v1.3 this previously undocumented field is no longer used. Key bindings are now defined by the LookAndFeel, please refer to the key bindings specification for further details.

members.name: createUI
members.comment: Constructs a new instance of BasicDesktopPaneUI.

members.name: installDefaults
members.comment: Installs default properties.

members.name: uninstallDefaults
members.comment: Uninstalls default properties.

members.name: installListeners
members.comment: Installs the PropertyChangeListener returned from createPropertyChangeListener on the JDesktopPane.

members.name: uninstallListeners
members.comment: Uninstalls the PropertyChangeListener returned from createPropertyChangeListener from the JDesktopPane.

members.name: installDesktopManager
members.comment: Installs desktop manager.

members.name: uninstallDesktopManager
members.comment: Uninstalls desktop manager.

members.name: installKeyboardActions
members.comment: Installs keyboard actions.

members.name: registerKeyboardActions
members.comment: Registers keyboard actions.

members.name: unregisterKeyboardActions
members.comment: Unregisters keyboard actions.

members.name: uninstallKeyboardActions
members.comment: Unregisters keyboard actions.

members.name: createPropertyChangeListener
members.comment: Returns the PropertyChangeListener to install on the JDesktopPane.

return: The PropertyChangeListener that will be added to track changes in the desktop pane.

members.comment: Constructs a new instance of BasicDesktopPaneUI.
